name: Silent Hill Unity
description:
"SILENT HILL Unity" is a tech demo, created only to test my (very lacking at the time) skills at Unity. The demo features the first portion of the town recreated from memory using free assets. As it is only a tech demo, it does not have an ending, because I did not program enemies yet.

This game was only uploaded for learning purposes!

If this project does not get C&D'd by Konami, I might make it actually playable sometime. Until then, it is only a measly, buggy recreation.

THIS IS ONLY A PROOF-OF-CONCEPT PROJECT. TAKE IT WITH A GRAIN OF SALT.
